ygData.subject: Re: Jackalstock
ygData.msgSnippet: This weekend I got magic gloves for the first time (elf-hide gloves, ewww), and I was able to kabong ghouls.  This made me think it was the gloves which
ygData.messageBody:
This weekend I got magic gloves for the first time (elf-hide gloves,
ewww), and I was able to kabong ghouls. This made me think it was the
gloves which determined if you could kabong magic creatures or not (I
don't have a magic instrument, just the 4 I bought from the guild)

>
> You don't dual wield when holding an instrument. The
> instrument prevents your second hand from attacking, just like
> a shield (statements by Verant about needing magical
> instruments to hit magical mobs notwithstanding).
>
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
